scripts.build:js: mkdir -p ios-assets/js && mkdir -p ios-assets/res && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios-assets/js/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ios-assets/res/
scripts.build:meta: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | sed 's/[",	 ]//g' | awk -F: '{ print "Bundle Version: " $2 }' > ios-assets/js/version.meta
